overview: At the end of the century, swayed by the waves of recession and turmoil, a bright, piercing brain weather hero is born. A man who trained deep in the mountains of India and is rumored to have even made Michael Jackson white.  He was involved in a big incident over the existence of the nuclear material Uranium ore vein that produces enormous energy and must get himself out of this predicament.
title: Akasuriya Yusuke
